name: Virus Threat Defender
description:
Virus Threat Defender is an antivirus game that you are playing as antivirus. There are files that run entering the system, each file has a Virus Threat Point or VTP. Destroy files that have high VTP before getting into your system ! Each virus has a different way to be destroyed. So, hopefully you can be more concentrated and careful.

Feature :

- 9 stage mission with various objectives.

- Various infected files with different tools to kill.

- Upgrade energy amount to beat the hardest mission.

Facebook page : www.facebook.com/cascadePlay
Twitter : @cascadeplaydev
